name: Datalife
tagline: The farming engine is a commercial content management system (CMS)
body:
## Welcome to Datalife Engine!
DataLife Engine is a multi-function content management system. Thanks to a very powerful management system news, publications, articles, users, DataLife Engine is designed primarily for organization own media and blogs on the Internet. A large variety of basic capabilities of the script built into the script, allow DataLife Engine a step further ahead of its nearest competitor in this area of creating websites. And thanks to accurate and thought out structure of kernel, to minimize the resource requirements servers, DataLife Engine can easily work with vysokoposeschaemyh projects with a minimal load on the server.

## Powerfull
The flexibility and ease in customization and integration of own design will allow you to promptly study and understand the structure of the templates and accordingly deploy their own sites, without any additional material costs. The use of advanced technology AJAX will reduce as the traffic and resources of your server and traffic of your visitors, not to mention the ease of use of this technology on the website to the visitors of your website. Due to increased attention to the security of the script, to the convenience of working with him, and dynamic development, in favor of using DataLife Engine already expressed more than 90,000 portals around the world, successfully using it at work. Great attention is paid to script search engine optimization system that enables you to bring your website more visitors.
